meanings.sent1: The teacher asked us to write a multiline poem for class.
meanings.sent2: The computer program allows for multiline editing of text.
meanings.sent3: The multiline pattern on the wallpaper made the room look taller.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a multiline highway, branching off in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The multiline design on the dress created a slimming effect.

meanings.definition: Capable of displaying or processing multiple lines of text.
meanings.sent1: The new printer is able to print multiline documents quickly.
meanings.sent2: The multiline display on the screen showed all the information at once.
meanings.sent3: The multiline function on the phone made it easier to read long messages.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a multiline processor, handling many thoughts simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: The multiline feature on the tablet allowed for efficient multitasking.
